来自主动交流（对话，演说等等）的智慧生物
to rolls to use Deathly abilities

d557ea67-def9-4d4a-b4da-9d4e43d034cc.name: 无所惊扰
d557ea67-def9-4d4a-b4da-9d4e43d034cc.notes: 你不用投恐惧检定，反应修正值对于你来说也几乎无效。

5cfdadd1-f80c-4a22-98cf-55f436dc82f2.name: 崇高目标
5cfdadd1-f80c-4a22-98cf-55f436dc82f2.notes: @Maintain the natural order or Bring the worlds of life and death together@

4c02bd18-5673-4a70-92d5-7611f9c6d66f.name: 高痛阈
4c02bd18-5673-4a70-92d5-7611f9c6d66f.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

0e279cb8-2c60-4d96-b9b9-65fbb9f46511.name: 幸运
0e279cb8-2c60-4d96-b9b9-65fbb9f46511.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

5a8eb9bf-2ebd-4ce1-98f9-cc5d1217ca5e.name: 标志性装备
5a8eb9bf-2ebd-4ce1-98f9-cc5d1217ca5e.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

eceec99d-d899-4fde-8059-76598f8ea8ab.notes: Enemis defend at +1 against your third or later use.

3854621a-4c69-4655-9fb0-cc7ce8b1cba8.notes: Enemis defend at +1 against your third or later use.
